subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The status of the Rangers’ Derek Stepan, whose jaw was broken on a late hit in Game 3 and who missed Game 4, remained a game-time decision for Game 5 against the Canadiens on Tuesday night.
snippet: The status of the Rangers’ Derek Stepan, whose jaw was broken on a late hit in Game 3 and who missed Game 4, remained a game-time decision for Game 5 against the Canadiens on Tuesday night.
